001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.factory;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.base.DriverProvider;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.config.WebDriverConfig;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.providers.ChromeDriverProvider;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.providers.EdgeDriverProvider;
007import java.util.Map;
008import java.util.Optional;
009import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
010import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
011import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriverException;
012import org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions;
013
014/**
015 * Factory class for creating WebDriver instances based on registered driver providers.
016 *
017 * <p>This class manages WebDriver providers for different browser types and facilitates the
018 * creation of WebDriver instances with appropriate configurations.
019 *
020 * <p>By default, Chrome and Edge drivers are registered. Additional drivers can be registered
021 * dynamically using the {@link #registerDriver(String, DriverProvider)} method.
022 *
023 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
024 */
025public class WebDriverFactory {
026
027   private WebDriverFactory() {
028   }
029
030   /**
031    * Stores registered WebDriver providers, mapped by browser type (e.g., "CHROME", "EDGE").
032    */
033   private static final Map<String, DriverProvider<?>> DRIVER_PROVIDERS = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
034
035   static {
036      registerDriver("CHROME", new ChromeDriverProvider());
037      registerDriver("EDGE", new EdgeDriverProvider());
038   }
039
040   /**
041    * Registers a new WebDriver provider for a specified browser type.
042    *
043    * @param type     The browser type (e.g., "CHROME", "EDGE").
044    * @param provider The driver provider responsible for creating and managing the WebDriver instance.
045    * @param <T>      The type parameter extending {@link DriverProvider}.
046    * @throws IllegalArgumentException If a driver for the specified type is already registered.
047    */
048   public static <T extends DriverProvider<?>> void registerDriver(String type, T provider) {
049      if (DRIVER_PROVIDERS.containsKey(type.trim().toUpperCase())) {
050         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Driver type already registered: " + type);
051      }
052      DRIVER_PROVIDERS.put(type.trim().toUpperCase(), provider);
053   }
054
055   /**
056    * Creates a WebDriver instance for the specified browser type, using the provided configuration.
057    *
058    * @param type   The browser type (e.g., "CHROME", "EDGE").
059    * @param config The WebDriver configuration, specifying options such as version and headless mode.
060    * @return A fully configured {@link WebDriver} instance.
061    * @throws IllegalArgumentException If no driver is registered for the specified type.
062    * @throws RuntimeException         If WebDriver creation fails due to an unexpected error.
063    */
064   @SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"}) // Necessary for generic factory call
065   public static WebDriver createDriver(String type, WebDriverConfig config) {
066      DriverProvider<?> provider = Optional.ofNullable(DRIVER_PROVIDERS.get(type.trim().toUpperCase()))
067            .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("No driver registered for type: " + type));
068
069      provider.setupDriver(config.getVersion());
070
071      try {
072         return new DriverCreator<>().createDriver(config,
073               (DriverProvider<AbstractDriverOptions<?>>) provider);
074      } catch (Exception e) {
075         throw new WebDriverException("Failed to create WebDriver for type: " + type, e);
076      }
077   }
078
079}
